sense.name: provide additional insurance for
sense.examples: OPL reinsured UPS shipments, spreading the risk among many insurance carriers. Werness' annuity isn't reinsured by an insurance company. The company developed a program to reinsure mortgages. The agent told him that Lloyds of London had reinsured this packet of gems.

sense.name: insure under a new policy
sense.examples: LandAmerica would pay his newly formed shop to reinsure the policy. Hathaway offered to reinsure the $1.5 billion of risk. HMOs need to reinsure to manage the rare, but costly special care. You see, many of the German companies have reinsured in foreign countries.
